body:
This one-line fix corrects the git URL so cloning (e.g. `@develop`) succeeds.

I was able to reproduce the reported problem on the system having the issue using `spack -d stage kokkos-nvcc-wrapper@develop` and confirm `Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed`.

The stage command succeeded on that system with this fix.
title: Bugfix/kokkos-nvcc-wrapper: Correct the git URL
